channel.title: Making A Barrier And Send Message?
channel.description:
How Do I Make A Barrier [need code] And Send A Message?
e.g: [code]makeGlobalObject(3284, 3883, 2156, -2, 10);//007[/code] i want to do that..BUT it wont show up!!!
And wen i goto case 132 and try adding more objects [portal teles] it gives 2 errer..-.- how i fix??
Thank You People!

item.title: Making A Barrier And Send Message?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

For changing the bank of runescape find your openupbank method and under it add sendQuest("", 5383);

inside the “” add what you want it to say and if you wanted it to say “the bank of players name” you would make it

sendQuest("The bank of "+playerName, 5383);

Read full topic
